name: star of lemutia
description: This game allows you to play doubles alone. in this hard real-time tactical game, you will lead two heroes and their respective four mercenaries into battle against waves of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
